name: Fast WooTags
author: FastFlow

sections.description:
Fast WooTags is designed to work seamlessly with the Fast Flow tagging system and WooCommerce

Using Fast WooTags you can add tags to users based on both their WooCommerce purchases and their order status.

When used along with any of our other CRM and Autoresponder add-ons you can syncronise your customer purchases and also trigger automations based on their purchases and orders.

This can be useful for cart abaondons and customer specific journeys allowing you to create a tailored customer experience for your buyers.

NOTE: Fast WooTags requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to make use of the Fast Tags and utilise the user tagging.

https://wordpress.org/plugins/fast-flow-dashboard/

You can find out more about Fast Flow here

https://fastflow.io
sections.installation:
NOTE: This plugin requires the Fast Flow Dashboard to make use of Fast Tags.

Upload through your WordPress admin or via FTP.

Once uploaded simply activate and then navigate to the Fast Tags section of the Fast Flow Dashboard and begin adding tags.

On activation the following Fast Tags will automatically be created to syncronise the various WooCommerce order statuses

Pending payment
Processing
On hold
Completed
Cancelled
Refunded
Failed
sections.changelog:
1.2

Added hooks for WC Subscription plugin failed subscriptions status

woocommerce_subscription_status_expired
woocommerce_subscription_status_on-hold

1.1.2

  • Order status notice fix

1.1.1

  • Sanitized POST data

1.1.0

  • Prepared for repository release
